{{cpp/title|operator&lt;&lt;&lt;small&gt;(std::stacktrace_entry)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/utility/stacktrace_entry/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=stacktrace|since=c++23|
std::ostream&amp; operator&lt;&lt;( std::ostream&amp; os, const std::stacktrace_entry&amp; f );
}}

Inserts the description of {{c|f}} into the output stream {{c|os}}. Equivalent to {{c|return os &lt;&lt; std::to_string(f);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|os|an output stream}}
{{par|f|a {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} whose description is to be inserted}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|os}}

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;stacktrace&gt;

int main()
{
    for (const auto&amp; f : std::stacktrace::current())
        std::cout &lt;&lt; f &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=&lt;!--obtained from Boost.Stacktrace--&gt;
0x0000000000402AA7 in ./prog.exe
__libc_start_main in /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
0x00000000004029B9 in ./prog.exe
}}
